title: T-Minus 12 Days: I'm not very good at writing daily
body:
This whole "writing a new post every day" gig... I'm not very cut out for it. I know, I'm terrible. But at least I try! Sometimes the thought of sitting down and writing about my day seems overwhelming, which is pretty pathetic, I know. Either way, I think I'm going to do a video blog today. Nothing fancy, just me staring at the webcam on my computer and talking about my day. Just a good, old fashioned, boring vlog. Ok, here we go:



Guh. That was worse than I would've guessed. Sorry about that. I'm not sorry about the audio not being synced up, however. It's kinda funny.
author: Dan
